response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $15,000 to us, reflecting its unique features, innovative technology, and the dedication of our team behind it. We believe its potential impact on your endeavors could be immense. Considering its unparalleled value and the opportunity it presents, we are offering this remarkable product to you for $14,999. We hope this price aligns with your expectations and allows us to share this masterpiece with you. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 14999}
